title: Halloween Cupcakes
subtitle: Get into the spooky spirit with our limited edition Halloween cupcakes!

description.title: A Spooky Selection in Every Box
description.p1: This year we have prepared a special Halloween cupcake box for you. What can you look forward to?
description.pickup: Order pickup will take place on October 30th and 31st.
